ProteomicsExplorer 0.99.0
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Displays a correlation matrix of the quantitative data of a numeric matrix.

Source: R/mod_corrmatrix.R, R/plot_corrmatrix.R
corrmatrix.Rd

xxxx

mod_corrmatrix_ui(id)

mod_corrmatrix_server(
  id,
  data,
  rate = reactive({     0.5 }),
  showValues = reactive({     FALSE })
)

corrMatrix(data, rate = 0.5, showValues = FALSE)

Arguments

id

xxx

data

An object of class 'SummarizedExperiment'

rate

The rate parameter to control the exponential law for the gradient of colors

showValues

xxx

Examples

library(QFeatures)

data(ft)
corrMatrix(assay(ft, 1))
#> Error in corrMatrix(assay(ft, 1)): could not find function "corrMatrix"


#------------------------------------------
# Shiny module
#------------------------------------------
if(interactive()){
data(ft)
 ui <- mod_corrmatrix_ui('plot')

 server <- function(input, output, session) {
  mod_corrmatrix_server('plot', 
  reactive({assay(ft, 1)})
  )}
 
 shinyApp(ui=ui, server=server)
}
